banner.title: Enjoy the best delicacies of the region.
banner.titledescription1: Chocolates to your liking: Create, Savor, Enjoy!
banner.description1: Make your sweet moments even more special! Discover our range of artisanal chocolates and create your own flavor paradise with custom orders. Turn your ideas into exquisite chocolate realities and place your order today!
banner.titledescription2: Chocolate Combos: Find Your Sweet Balance!
banner.description2: Discover perfection in every combination! Our artisan chocolate drawers offer you a unique experience. Delight yourself with our carefully prepared selection, where each bite is an explosion of flavor! Find your ideal combo and immerse yourself in a world of sweet sensations.
banner.titledescription3: Tempting Delights: Artisanal Chocolates and Bars for Absolute Pleasure
banner.description3: Sweet delights in every bite! Explore our variety of artisanal chocolates and chocolate bars. From the indulgence of our exquisite chocolates to the crunchy satisfaction of our bars, each product is created to delight your senses. Immerse yourself in a world of irresistible temptations and let yourself be seduced by the quality of our chocolates.
banner.titledescription4: Experience the Magic of Chocolate in Every Bite! Place your Order and Sweeten Yourself with Our Delicious Artisan Eggs.
banner.description4: What are you waiting for to delight your palate with our exquisite chocolate eggs? Make every moment sweeter and more special with our handmade products. Place your order now and let the magic of chocolate conquer your day!

carousel.slogan: The art of sweetening your moments!

about.title: Solutions to your Projects
about.description: An exceptional team of 7 fullstack developers is forged through inspiration, passion and a deep mastery of knowledge, destined to serve every entrepreneur. We are dedicated and highly committed to project execution, and our team is made up of professionals with solid communication skills, work experience and outstanding social aptitude.

coder.1: Full stack web developer with a solid background in React, Redux, Nodejs, JavaScript.
coder.2: Analytical with a high level of persistence, dedicated, responsible and committed to interpersonal relationships.
coder.3: Full Stack Web Developer, oriented to Front-end with React, in e-commerce projects structured to market trends based on demand.
coder.4: Experience in developing interactive and scalable web applications. Specialized in JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express.js, Sequelize and PostgreSQL.
coder.5: Fullstack web developer with specialization in frontend. Passionate about creating pleasant and functional user experiences.
coder.6: Decisive and passionate programmer. Always learning. Innovative, adaptive, eager to integrate latest technologies. Focused on results.
coder.7: Full Stack developer passionate about technology in constant search of solutions based on experience, creativity and willingness to contribute to your team.
